content: विमुच् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To free, liberate. {@--2@} To loosen, unbind, unfasten, untie आसीद्विवृत्तवदना च विमोचयंती ( वल्कलं) <ls>Ś. 2. 12.</ls> {@--3@} To give up, lay aside, abandon, quit; विमुच्य वासांसि गुरूनि सांप्रतं <ls>Rs. 1. 7.</ls> {@--4@} To let go, let loose; <ls>Bk. 7. 50.</ls> {@--5@} To except, set aside, set apart; <ls>Ku. 4. 31.</ls> {@--6@} To shed, pour down (te ars); चिरमश्रूणि विमुच्य राघवः <ls>R. 8. 25.</ls> {@--7@} To throw, cast. {@--8@} To take off (clothes), undress oneself. {@--9@} To stop, cease. {@--10@} To take, assume. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To be deprived of, be freed from.
